# Search Using String

# Description

Search records in
                    Salesforce using a string by executing an SOSL parameterized search.

# Project
                compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Search parameter - Enter a string to search for. This field supports String type input.
* Select object - Select a Salesforce object to restrict the search.
* Generate schema - The schema generate button.









* Parameterized search - Automatically generated output variable.
